title: Higher Ping
body: I've been having +20 ping these past 2 days and not sure what's going on. Heard it had something to do with time warner but have no idea what is happening or when it will be fixed. Any feedback would be appreciated

replies.body: 20 ping is not an awful ping, unless you mean it's higher by that amount.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview of what's happening, and if there's any packet loss.  Let me know what your results are, and we can take a deeper look.

I have also experienced a ping increase of approximately 20. 
https://gyazo.com/cd1e8784bbed5ddebf95d8ab4c7b2156
The log reader says there is no problem but an increase of 20 ping is huge. From what I can tell, it's not my service provider.

Hey there, thanks for the logs!  There's always a chance that your ISP is routing you a long way to reach riot direct.  Most commonly, though, your network might be struggling by a more local source.  My recommendation would be to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your settings and strength of your network is solid.  Hope that helps!

Would this have anything to do with riot updating their routers 2 days ago and players having to re-route? If the answer is yes, is this a permanent ping increase? I have already followed all the steps in the connection issue link and none seem to help.

There was a maintenance the other day, but it shouldn't impact how your ISP routes your network to the game server.  There's always a chance though that your routing can change regardless, and sometimes configuring your DNS via the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help update that.

You can also run a traceroute to 104.160.131.1 via [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to see how exactly you're routing.

I already tried configuring my DNS. Is there anything I can ask my service provider to get this fixed? I'm losing games because of high ping and probably getting reported by team for it. I love the game but if I'm going to lose hundreds of lp and get flamed, the game isn't worth playing at the moment.

I don't recommend playing anything other than customs while troubleshootings, otherwise you do run the risk of losing more LP.  It's important to go over each step of the guide mentioned before.  If the steps don't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can work with you directly to see what's going on.
